detail_desc: Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with embroidery and appliqués on the front and a detachable, lined hood. Wind flap with press-studs and a zip down the front, flap side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in velvet with wide shoulder straps, a visible zip at the front and a seam at the waist. Lined at the top.
Joggers in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a broderie anglaise flounce over the shoulder seams.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants. Adjustable length, 44-51 cm and 50-58 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Short, high-waisted shorts in stretch twill with lacing at the sides, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a decorative knot at the front.
Metal bangles in various designs, one with a pendant.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and press-studs at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, a seam at the waist with pleats and a flared skirt with a zip in the side. Lined front.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined.

Coat in felted fabric containing some wool. Double-layered hood, a shawl collar, concealed press-studs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.

Lightly padded jacket with a fleece-lined stand-up collar, detachable lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets, patches on the elbows and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a panel and frills at the front. Seam and drawstring at the waist and a wide broderie anglaise flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Nursing tops in soft viscose jersey with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Push-up bras in jersey and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Elasticated seam and tie belt below the bust, and a double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and seam with a wide lace band at the waist. Concealed zip at the back and a voluminous, flared skirt. Lined bodice and skirt.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist that can be folded down, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a low, roll-edge neckline and roll edges around the sleeves.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

prod_name: TP BILLY Basic 2-p S/S r n BB
detail_desc: T-shirts in organic cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Short top in airy jersey containing glittery threads. V-neck with a draped knot detail at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

prod_name: NATE  basic S/S solid tee BB
detail_desc: T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathered shoulder seams and narrow elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a layered skirt. Jersey lining.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Chelsea boots with elasticated gores in the sides and rubber soles.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
V-neck top in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.
Long-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with hole embroidery. Small stand-up collar and a yoke with covered buttons at the top. 3/4-length balloon sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
No-show trainer socks in mesh with a silicone trim on the inside of the heels to hold them in place.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Calf-length culottes in a recycled polyester weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Metal watch with a sparkly stone-trimmed face and narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 21 cm. Diameter of watch 2.5 cm.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a faceted button at the top. Patterned lining.

Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut blouse in an airy, zebra-striped rami weave. Yoke at the back with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and puff sleeves that have volume at the top and taper to the cuffs where there is a button. Longer and gently rounded at the back, and slits in the sides.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Top in lightweight, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Briefs in ribbed cotton jersey with a lined gusset and scalloped trims.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Slim-fit biker jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front and back pockets, and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Slub cotton jersey vest top with a print motif front and back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Velvet leggings with an elasticated waist.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and contrasting colour buttons. Long sleeves with decorative buttons, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Dress in a soft weave with a round neckline, buttons at the back and a gathered yoke front and back. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Adjustable, chunky metal chain bracelet with a claw clasp.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in jacquard-knit merino wool. Jumper with buttons at the back of the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Set with metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. Four ear cuffs and eight non-matching earrings.
Soft cotton jersey T-shirts in various designs. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Gently fitted jacket in a linen weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and flap welt front pockets. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
